replies.replyText: What has happend to your ship?

1.npcText: Attacked by Klisk raider. Managed to blow it up. Suffered critical damage. Require resources to repair engines.

replies.replyText: Sorry, we can not spare resources.

2.npcText: 5 units will be enough. Engines will start and journey will continue.

replies.replyText: We will gladly help you. Prepare for transfer.
And what we will get in return?
Sorry, we do not have enough.

3.npcText: Nothing is free in this world. Some Klisk credits available. Will pay you 5 credits. Nothing more left. Usually do not exchange valuable credits for raw resources, but special circumstances here.

replies.replyText: One credit for one resource unit? I like your way of doing business. We accept.
Not too much for your lives. I guess we can get more if just tell Klisk about your location.

4.npcText: Nothing more valuable left on this ship.

replies.replyText: All right, we accept your offer but only because of pure kindness.
Then you are just out of luck. Over.
Not too much for your lives. I guess we can get more if just tell Klisk about your location.

5.npcText: It is possible. Preparations will be done for that case. <Alien ship cuts communication>
